name: Product Lister for Etsy
author: CedCommerce

sections.description:
Product Lister for Etsy allows user to integrate WooCommerce with Etsy, allowing you to sell on Etsy easily with your WooCommerce store and manage everything from one place.

Product Lister for Etsy 3.1.2 is available now with all new features suggested by WordPress Community. We are getting huge response from the community which keep motivating us to add more useful feature to this plugin and make life easier than never before.

For advance features of Product Lister for Etsy, upgrade to the premium version of Etsy Integration For WooCommerce.

MAJOR FEATURES

  • List Single Products on Etsy: Enable the ability to easily upload individual products to the Etsy marketplace.

  • List Variable Products on Etsy: Facilitate the listing of products with multiple variations on Etsy.

  • Automatic Price and Inventory Synchronization: Develop a feature that ensures seamless synchronization of prices and inventory levels between Etsy and WooCommerce.

  • Category Mapping: Implement a category mapping system that allows products to be assigned to the appropriate categories on Etsy, streamlining the listing process.

  • Profile Settings Management: Create a user-friendly interface for users to manage and customize their profiles and settings.

  • Bulk Product Sync (Up to 100 products): Allow users to effortlessly transfer a significant number of products from WooCommerce to Etsy, up to a limit of 100 products at once.

  • Timline Activity: Allow users to check all the activities regarding Inventory, Products and Cron execution in timeline section.

Etsy Integration For WooCommerce Premium Version

The Etsy Integration for WooCommerce offers a streamlined and efficient way to connect your Etsy and WooCommerce stores. This integration empowers you to synchronize product details, inventory, and orders between the Etsy and WooCommerce stores. Moreover, you can also import Etsy product listings to your WooCommerce store. With the integration solution in place, sellers can efficiently manage their online presence by listing products on both platforms simultaneously and ensuring consistent inventory updates.

FEATURES OF PREMIUM VERSION

âœ… Unlimited Product and Order Sync: Ensure that the system can seamlessly synchronize an unlimited number of products and orders between Etsy and WooCommerce.

âœ… Auto Product Upload from WooCommerce to Etsy: Implement a user-friendly feature that automatically uploads products from your WooCommerce store to your Etsy shop, simplifying the listing process.

âœ… Auto Product Import from Etsy to WooCommerce: Develop an Import Module that enables the automatic import of products from Etsy into WooCommerce, streamlining your product management.

âœ… Shipment Tracking Plugin Compatibility: Ensure compatibility with shipment tracking plugins, allowing for the automatic and real-time updating of tracking information from WooCommerce to Etsy, enhancing the customer experience.

âœ… Support for Digital Files: Provide the capability to upload digital files directly from WooCommerce to Etsy, accommodating a variety of product types.

âœ… Auto Inventory Synchronization: Implement an automated inventory synchronization system that keeps product quantities accurate and up-to-date across both platforms.

âœ… Auto Order Retrieval: Enable automatic order retrieval from your Etsy store to your WooCommerce panel, simplifying order management and fulfillment.

âœ… User-Friendly Configuration: Offer a straightforward and intuitive configuration process, making it easy for users to set up and customize the integration according to their preferences.

âœ… Easy Installation and Usage: Ensure that the integration is easy to install and use, reducing the learning curve and allowing users to get started quickly.

âœ… Streamlined Configuration: Provide a streamlined configuration process, allowing users to adjust settings with ease and tailor the integration to their specific needs.

OTHER USEFUL PLUGINS FROM CEDCOMMERCE

Other useful plugins from Cedcommerce to make your web better:

ðŸ”¸ Hide Price Until Login: Hide Price of the products on shop and product detail page until user is not logged in or until password is entered.
ðŸ”¸ One Click Order Re-Order: It is used to add any previous order products to cart.After installing this plugin a button having name Re-Order will be added at Order listing section on My Account page next to each orders as well as on order detail page.
ðŸ”¸ Recently viewed and most viewed products: Recently viewed and most viewed products provides an extra feature to merchant to show recently viewed products and most viewed products on the product detail page and also at any place through out the site by adding given shortcode.
ðŸ”¸ WP Advanced PDF: WP Advanced PDF is a pdf generator for posts to pages. This plugin enables your blog readers to create pdf of posts of your blog. WP Advanced PDF relies on the TCPDF class to render PDF.
ðŸ”¸ Shipping & Delivery Date management with gift message: Shipping & Delivery Date management with gift message extension allows selection of delivery date, messaging of gift hampers, shipping address management feature.

About cedcommerce.com

Cedcommerce We embarked on the journey of providing best-in-class affordable eCommerce solutions. We came together as a group of hardworking people with a single-minded goal- making eCommerce easier.We believe in providing tailor-made solutions for our clientsâ€™ specific needs. Our attention to detail & dedication has helped us become a global leader and a one-stop shop for e-Commerce solutions.

Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 4.7 or greater
  • WooCommerce 3.0.0 or greater
  • PHP version 5.6 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater

Support

If you need support or have any question then kindly use our online chat window here or send us email at support@cedcommerce.com

Follow Us

  • Our Official Website – https://cedcommerce.com/
  • Our Facebook Page – https://www.facebook.com/CedCommerce
  • Our Google+ Account – https://plus.google.com/u/0/118378364994508690262
  • Our Twitter Account – https://twitter.com/cedcommerce
  • Our LinkedIn Account – https://www.linkedin.com/company/cedcommerce
sections.installation:
Automatic installation

In the search field type ” Product Lister for Etsy” and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found our ‘Product Lister for Etsy’ you can view details about it such as the point release, rating and description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

The manual installation method involves downloading the plugin and uploading it to your webserver via your favourite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.

Updating

No Automatic updates should work in free version ,you can get automatic update in premium version .
sections.faq:
Where can I get support or talk to other users?

If you get stuck, you can ask for help in the CedCommerce Support.

Where can I report bugs?

Bugs can be reported in our support forum CedCommerce Support.

For More Query ?

You can get more Knowledge about Product Lister for Etsy from Knowledgebase

short_description: Product Lister for Etsy allows user to sync their WooCommerce store and its products to the Etsy Marketplace.
